# cloudns Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "cloudns" {
  sub_auth_id = 1234
  password    = "verysecret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **password** (String, Sensitive)

### Optional

- **auth_id** (Number)
- **sub_auth_id** (Number)
